siteMetadata.title: Blog by Tableau Tim
siteMetadata.subtitle: Data, quantifiedself and everything in between.

frontmatter.title: Mobile device test Tableau dashboards without a device.
frontmatter.description: One question I often get is how I manage my workflow for mobile device designs in Tableau. Depending on your version this can be tricky especially if youd like to test things in a semi realistic environment. In this post i show one way you can test in the browser, without a device.

frontmatter.title: Step Line Chart in Tableau: Quick Tip
frontmatter.description: In this quick video, I summarise how to create a step line chart in Tableau.
